newsitem.title: USA: Tosco raises div despite late-Q3 weakness.
newsitem.headline: Tosco raises div despite late-Q3 weakness.

text.p: Tosco Corp, in its latest move to show money can be wrung out of the rocky oil refining and marketing business, said it will raise its quarterly dividend to $0.17 a share from $0.16 previously.

"The board's decision to raise the common stock dividend after two years...reflects both their satisfaction with the company's growth and development ovr the past few years, and their confidence in the future," Thomas D. O'Malley, Tosco's Chairman and Chief Executive Officer said in a prepared statement.
